verbs.description: No matter [ARG0: who] [V: wins] [ARG1: the NBA title] , neither the Warriors nor the Cavaliers have any interest in being invited to President Trump ’s White House .
[ARGM-ADV: No matter who wins the NBA title] , [ARG0: neither the Warriors nor the Cavaliers] [V: have] [ARG1: any interest in being invited to President Trump ’s White House] .
No matter who wins the NBA title , neither the Warriors nor the Cavaliers have any interest in [V: being] invited to President Trump ’s White House .
No matter who wins the NBA title , [ARG1: neither the Warriors nor the] Cavaliers have any interest in being [V: invited] [ARG2: to President Trump ’s White House] .
